Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.commons

Class FileChooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.commons.FileChooser
  • public class FileChooser
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a common file chooser for the choosing of JSON files This can be used to choose files for either recording, or to play a saved game
